title: warn if user tries to build from source on windows & python 2.7
body_html:
install from source, run the test, i got error:

File "D:\CashmereRuntime\Applications\python\2.7.11\lib\multiprocessing\process.py", line 258, in _bootstrap
self.run()
File "D:\CashmereRuntime\Applications\python\2.7.11\lib\multiprocessing\process.py", line 114, in run
self._target(*self._args, **self._kwargs)
File "D:\CashmereRuntime\PythonLibraries\pytorch\0.4.0\lib\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 92, in _worker_loop
watchdog = ManagerWatchdog()
File "D:\CashmereRuntime\PythonLibraries\pytorch\0.4.0\lib\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 48, in init
self.manager_pid = os.getppid()

body:
install from source, run the test, i got error:

 File "D:\CashmereRuntime\Applications\python\2.7.11\lib\multiprocessing\process.py", line 258, in _bootstrap
    self.run()
  File "D:\CashmereRuntime\Applications\python\2.7.11\lib\multiprocessing\process.py", line 114, in run
    self._target(*self._args, **self._kwargs)
  File "D:\CashmereRuntime\PythonLibraries\pytorch\0.4.0\lib\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 92, in _worker_loop
    watchdog = ManagerWatchdog()
  File "D:\CashmereRuntime\PythonLibraries\pytorch\0.4.0\lib\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 48, in __init__
    self.manager_pid = os.getppid()
